item.title: Master 2 - Human Computer Interaction: Homework 4 – The Future of Devices, Ubiquitous Computing & Mixed Reality Apps
item.description: Analyzing the evolution of smartphone design, Mark Weiser’s vision for ubiquitous computing, and the rise of next-generation MR applications.
